sqlMap.select: select tuser.username, tperson.first_name, tperson.last_name, trole.name as role_name, trole.key as role_key from tbl_user as tuser inner join tbl_person as tperson on tperson.person_id = tuser.person_id inner join tbl_user_role as userrole on userrole.user_id = tuser.user_id inner join tbl_user_role_reg as trole on trole.user_role_id = userrole.user_role_id order by tuser.username
